## envctl project env add

Add a new environment to the project

```
envctl project env add <environment> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for add
```

```
      --config string    config file (default $HOME/.config/envctl/config.toml)
      --lang string      language for messages (default: auto-detect)
      --project string   project name (overrides .envctl file)

```
